directions.text: In food processor spin sugar for 2 mins.
Sift half of the sugar with the salt and cake flour in a bowl.
In another bowl Whisk egg whites, ⅓ cup water, extract, and cream of tartar for 2 mins.
Add bowl contents to mixer, whisk at med speed and sift other half of sugar in.
Let run for 10 mins (until `peaks` are achieved in foam).
Sift enough flour to cover the foam folding into it with a spatula repeatedly until incorporated.
Add mixture to ungreased tube pan and bake for 35 mins.
Cool upside down on a rack for 1 hour before removing from pan.
